text: If there be any contest as to the dimensions of the land claimed to be subjected to the lien aforesaid, the court shall determine the same upon the evidence and describe the same in the decree of sale.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 38-116.

1973 Ed., § 38-116.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 16-31 substituted "land" for "ground".

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-31, see notes following § 40-301.03.

DC CODE § 40-303.14

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Extent of ground bound by lien.
